head.supplied: 12/2/96. ¶ ¶ This evening, dear Mr Macdonald, I received the enclosed letter from our friend Major Boyd. ¶ When President Thomson's ¶ communication arrives, I will draft a reply, which you can adop...

div.p: A38, Royal Geographical Society of Australasia (Victorian Branch), Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

This evening, dear Mr Macdonald, I received the enclosed letter from our friend Major Boyd.
W. Boyd; letter not found. When President Thomson's
J. Thomson, recently elected President of the Queensland Branch of the Royal Geographical Society of Australasia. communication arrives, I will draft a reply, which you can adopt or alter, when it can be circulated among our Councillors for their opinion. Any how, any conference should stand on til I have in March delivered the triennial adress, on which occasion we will be able to see, whether our Governor can afford us such support as rendering it desirable to have a conference under his influence. His Excellency's attention is required in so many directions that we must not expect too much from him in our cause.
